26/* This is a simplified barrier that is suitable for thread pool
27 synchronizaton. Only a subset of full barrier API (bar.h) is exposed. */
28
29#ifndef GOMP_SIMPLE_BARRIER_H
30#define GOMP_SIMPLE_BARRIER_H 1
31
32#include "bar.h"
33
34typedef struct
35{
36 gomp_barrier_t bar;
37} gomp_simple_barrier_t;
38
39static inline void
40gomp_simple_barrier_init (gomp_simple_barrier_t *bar, unsigned count)
41{
42 gomp_barrier_init (&bar->bar, count);
43}
44
45static inline void
46gomp_simple_barrier_reinit (gomp_simple_barrier_t *bar, unsigned count)
47{
48 gomp_barrier_reinit (&bar->bar, count);
49}
50
51static inline void
52gomp_simple_barrier_destroy (gomp_simple_barrier_t *bar)
53{
54 gomp_barrier_destroy (&bar->bar);
55}
56
57static inline void
58gomp_simple_barrier_wait (gomp_simple_barrier_t *bar)
59{
60 gomp_barrier_wait (&bar->bar);
61}
62
63static inline void
64gomp_simple_barrier_wait_last (gomp_simple_barrier_t *bar)
65{
66 gomp_barrier_wait_last (&bar->bar);
67}
68
69#endif /* GOMP_SIMPLE_BARRIER_H */
70
